alert.note: Alert for Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 2:50PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wilkinson and northwestern Amite Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 250 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Gloster, or 19 miles west of Liberty, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Centreville, Gloster and Crosby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southern Mississippi.
